com.github.mk23.jmxproxy.jmx

Class ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mk23.jmxproxy.jmx.ConnectionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.dropwizard.lifecycle.Managed

    public class ConnectionManager
extends Object
implements io.dropwizard.lifecycle.Managed

    Main application lifecycle object that manages all JMX Agent Connections.

    Implements the dropwizard lifecycle Managed interface to create the object responsible for all application data management. Creates workers for connecting to JMX endpoints and handles requests for data retreival. Controls purging unaccessed endpoints as well as their runtime state.
    Since:
    2015-05-11
    Version:
    3.2.0
    Author:
    mk23
    See Also:
    io.dropwizard.lifecycle.Managed

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectionManager

        public ConnectionManager(AppConfig config)

        Default constructor.

        Called by the application initializer. Creates the map of host:port Strings to associated ConnectionWorker instances. Creates an instance of the unaccessed endpoints purge thread. Saves the provided applicaiton configuration for later retreival request.
        Parameters:
        config - configuration as specified by the administrator at application invocation.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfiguration

        public final AppConfig getConfiguration()

        Getter for config.

        Fetches the application run-time configuration object.
        Returns:
        application configuration.

      • getHosts

        public final Set<String> getHosts()

        Getter for hosts.

        Fetches the Set of ConnectionWorker name Strings.
        Returns:
        Set of ConnectionWorker name Strings.

      • delHost

        public final boolean delHost(String host)
                      throws javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException

        Deleter for host.

        Attempts to remove the specified host from the ConnectionWorker map store.
        Parameters:
        host - endpoint host:port String.
        Returns:
        true if the key is found in the map store.
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException - if key is not found in the map store.

      • getHost

        public final Host getHost(String host)
                   throws javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException

        Anonymous getter for host.

        Fetches the specified Host with anonymous (null) credentials. Equivalent to calling:
        return getHost(host, null);
        Parameters:
        host - endpoint host:port String.
        Returns:
        Host object for the requested endpoint.
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException - if unauthorized, forbidden, or invalid endpoint.

      • getHost

        public final Host getHost(String host,
           ConnectionCredentials auth)
                   throws javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException

        Authenticated getter for host.

        Fetches the specified Host with provided credentials. Validates endpoint access against a configured whitelist. Validates provided credentials against previous requests and if different, a new ConnectionWorker object is instanciated and associated with the specified endpoint. Lastly, if specified endpoint is not yet in the map store, instanciates a new ConnectionWorker and saves it for later retreival.
        Parameters:
        host - endpoint host:port String.
        auth - endpoint ConnectionCredentials or null for anonymous access.
        Returns:
        Host object for the requested endpoint.
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException - if
        • forbidden (not whitelisted)
        • unauthized (incorrect credentials)
        • bad request (malformed host:port)
        • not found (any other exception)

      • isStarted

        public final boolean isStarted()

        Getter for started.

        Used by the application health check to verify the manager start() method has been invoked.
        Returns:
        true if the manager was started, false otherwise.

      • start

        public final void start()

        Handler for application startup.

        Starts the unaccessed endpoint purge thread at application initialization.
        Specified by:
        start in interface io.dropwizard.lifecycle.Managed

      • stop

        public final void stop()

        Handler for application shutdown.

        Stops the purge thread and all currently tracked ConnectionWorker instances.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface io.dropwizard.lifecycle.Managed
